## Description {#details}

Helper class for dealing with a scalar element at the end of a record.

This has a separate implementation because up until now we&#39;ve only been <em>building</em> the record (into a data buffer), and now we need to hand it off to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter">BitstreamWriter</a> to be emitted.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bcrecordlayout">BCRecordLayout</a>
</SectionUser>
